column5: Tis the season for Steelhead, Im sure many are just starting and learning to catch these magnificent fish. Weather and river condition doesnt seem to be too promising for the next 2 days, so instead I browse through the internet and try to learn more tactics and tips.  Found this "Shotting Patterns" off Raven Tackle website. http://www.raventackle.com/Shotting%20Patterns.pdf  Feel free to post more web links of Steelhead Fishing tips for us OFNers. Myself recently discovered Fish On Line Fishing News Portal through a post on the site. Thanks efka!
Actually solopaddler, there's this guy named Mike who is a pretty good teacher.
Heh, there is a huge line up to go fishing with Mike ...
who or what is this MIKE of whom you speak?
Thats some helpfull info thx for sharing it will come in handy for sure.... cant wait to get out for some Steal....
Mike is a steelheading legend in these parts!  :P  :P  :P
